text:
Has more equipment than the newer nearby SRC gym, recommended if you prefer heavier weights.

Had lots of space and equipment to myself since the area is a little old and out of the way, so it's not that popular. Been told that the sports teams might crowd out the gym during semester, but i havent encountered it myself.

Side note: Hoping the walls get a fresh coat of paint. It's a pukey shade of yellow currently.
Convenient location within NUS, courts can be booked via the online system for students and staff only.

Nice hall with plenty of seating grandstand area. Tho the walk is very far up the hill scheduled in an area. More convenient if you own a car. Toilet is also not locAted within the hall. Overall still a decent sports hall compare to SIT dover. Dont even have proper sports facility.
A lot of multi purpose hall which can accumulate a huge crowd for an indoor event. Currently it is under renovation, hope that the new look will be far more interesting.
Great place. It has gym, swimming pool, squash courts, even a rock climbing wall. There are 3 meeting rooms and a cafeteria.
